sources.title: Black Tights (1960) MAURICE CHAVALIER
sources.description:
Director: Terence Young
Writer: Roland Petit
Stars: Moira Shearer, Cyd Charisse, Zizi Jeanmaire
Presenter: Maurice Chevalier

And now for something completely different! Four Ballets of Paris by Frenchman Roland Petit, each with an introduction by Maurice Chevalier. 
From the director of Dr. No, Thunderball, and From Russia with Love, filmed in Luscious Technirama. Viva Le France!

CHAPTERS
0:00           PizzaFLIX Intro/Movie Credits
2:32         "The Gold Digger" starring Zizi Jeanmaire (wife of Roland Petit)
28:31       "Cyrano de Bergerac" starring Moira Shearer of "The Red Shoes" fame.
1:03:53    "A Merry Mourning" starring Cyd Charisse
1:28:33     "Carmen" starring Zizi Jeanmaire

metadata.Plot: Live scenes of Paris and a continuity Narrator link together four dramatic re-enactments of original ballet creations by Roland Petit and his ensemble, Ballets de Paris: Carmen (1949), La croqueuse de diamants (1950), Deuil en 24 heures (1953), and Cyrano de Bergerac (1959).
metadata.Writer: Roland Petit, Edmond Rostand, Prosper Mérimée
metadata.Actors: Maurice Chevalier, Les Ballets de Paris, Zizi Jeanmaire
